MOTHER CARE Benefits Of Baby Massage MOTHER CARE Benefits Of Baby Massage

Intuition and personal experience tells us that person-to-person touch is healthy, com- ments Stress and Health Report. - Intuition and personal experience tells us that person-to-person touch is healthy, com- ments Stress and Health Report. -

This principle was applied to the care of a group of premature babies, according to a journal published recently. Itcites a scientificstudy of 40 such infants. Twenty other premature infants received normal care. The 20 who had been massaged fared better than the other 20 in several respects. Their daily weight gain averaged 47 percent higher, their scores on behavioural tests were higher. They seemed more active and alert. The report concludes that "what is good for very small babes probably is good for us all." Parents should always touch their kids, it stimulates affection between them, it drags them closer. You massage the head of your child, you will notice that nice feeling, the child will re- spond, it means such child is active, it creates a warm feeling. Draw your children nearer. Kiss, cuddle, stroke, express your love today, it makes them grow to love you and the society at large. LIFE LIFE
Saying 'No' Nicely I Saying 'No' Nicely I
PL Do you know that you can be friendly and dependable withoutletting people walk over you? PL Do you know that you can be friendly and dependable withoutletting people walk over you?

If you are constantly stepped on, watch your- self, you need to be more assertive about your needs and wants, don't always allow people to ride you, stand on your feet always. Try not to be domineering and aggressive. These tips by a psychologist will stop people from taking advantage of you. Always do what you feel is good for you; if you back out of a task, you can always have the confidence to tell the person affected that you have changed your mind. If you feel like helping a person will do harm to you, don't do it, think properly over it. Don't force people to like you, don't use assistance to bribe your way through; if you are helping someone, don't expect anything in re- turn. Don't be too rigid, you can always change your decisions if it is convenient for you. Always allow others to contribute to whatever vousre doing be it in the office or at home. You call always jobs to others too. Don't be a k of all trades, master of none. Know About Hair Care Know About Hair Care

* Brushing reduces tangles, adds body and curl when styling and counteracts Limpness. Brushing your hair will contribute to its growth. Excessive or vigorous brushing can irritate and damage both your scalp and hair espe- cially if your hair. is dry, damaged from colouring or suffers from over-exposure to the sun. Using a conditioner after every shampoo improves the effectiveness of brushing because it will give your hair a protective coating. Gentle brushing is the key to a beautiful shining hair. * Brushing reduces tangles, adds body and curl when styling and counteracts Limpness. Brushing your hair will contribute to its growth. Magnesium And Heart Problem Magnesium And Heart Problem
HEALTH Cedar Oil As Contraceptive HEALTH Cedar Oil As Contraceptive

Magnesium is the second most com- mon mineral In our cells and scientific reports link a deficiency in magnesium in the body not only to heart problems but also to some migraines and the type of Pre - Menstrual Syndrome (PMS) which makes women become anxious and crave sweet, fatty foods. Magnesium is the second most com- mon mineral In our cells and scientific reports link a deficiency in magnesium in the body not only to heart problems but also to some migraines and the type of Pre - Menstrual Syndrome (PMS) which makes women become anxious and crave sweet, fatty foods.

Human beings have been searching for ways to remove the likelihood of pregnancy from the act of coitus for at least 2,500 years Aristotle suggested cedar oil as a contracep- tive. Human beings have been searching for ways to remove the likelihood of pregnancy from the act of coitus for at least 2,500 years Aristotle suggested cedar oil as a contracep- tive.

A major improvement in contraceptive aids came in the 19th century with the vulcanization of rubber. Undoubtedly what will stand as the most historic breakthrough came in 1954 when two doctors working together discovereda drug that, when taken in pill form by a woman, could interrupt the process of ovulation and thus, prevent the union of female eggand malesperm. Experts once suggested that birth control has done more to emancipate women than their gaining the right to vote. So if you suffer from migraine or PMS, why not try increasing magnesium levels? Eat a healthy diet with more/nuts, seafood, beans and peas, whole grains, green leafy veg- etables and chocolate (plain is best). Alternatively, try a magnesium supplement. BODY FITNESS BODY FITNESS
Exercise Tips Exercise Tips

A leisure psychologist, James Gavina, says people who are contemplating on exercise should know joining a fitness club will make them exercise regularly. These few tips, says the psychologist, will assist would-be exercisers on what to do. A leisure psychologist, James Gavina, says people who are contemplating on exercise should know joining a fitness club will make them exercise regularly. These few tips, says the psychologist, will assist would-be exercisers on what to do.

Insufficient motivation: Just wanting to lose a few pounds may be enough to getyou started, but to be really satisfying, exercise should also cater for an emotional need, such as wanting to work off anger, raise self esteem, increase energy, improve mood, or just be with others and have fun. Insufficient motivation: Just wanting to lose a few pounds may be enough to getyou started, but to be really satisfying, exercise should also cater for an emotional need, such as wanting to work off anger, raise self esteem, increase energy, improve mood, or just be with others and have fun.
For these who want to raise their self esteem, exercises like swimming, walking or rowing is good. For these who want to raise their self esteem, exercises like swimming, walking or rowing is good.

Lack of patience. Most people are un- prepared for the reality. Forming an exercise habit can take a year or more with many treacherous patches of discomfort. If you recognise that these feelings are a normal part of the change of process it is a first good step. Dieters should watch what they eat so that the work-out will be successful. Lack of patience. Most people are un- prepared for the reality. Forming an exercise habit can take a year or more with many treacherous patches of discomfort. If you recognise that these feelings are a normal part of the change of process it is a first good step. Dieters should watch what they eat so that the work-out will be successful.

People who have successfully carried out their work-out should be contacted to tell you their experience. No doubt they look great, so will you. People who have successfully carried out their work-out should be contacted to tell you their experience. No doubt they look great, so will you.

I slept throughout today. I was tired, weak and could hardly eat. I know it must be due to the fact ,ve stayed for some hours at the party. My health may deteriorate if care is not taken. I just forced myself to brush my teeth and dragged myself to the bathroom where I splashed some water on my dizzy eyes. This brought me a little relief.
